high_descs: Move to the bed to the left of you
Pick up a book from the bed
Move to the end table to the left of you
anns.task_desc: Inspect a book from the bed with a light.

high_descs: Move to the left side of the bed where the book is sitting on the bed
Pick up the blue book that is on top of the bed
Carry the book to the night stand where the lamp is
anns.task_desc: Carry a book while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bed on your right.
Pick up the book nearest to the laptop on the bed.
Turn to the right and walk to the end table next to the bed.
Switch on the lamp on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a book.
